title: Graph Theory-Based Adaptive Mathematics Learning Design System

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Learners access online platforms via personal devices to complete mathematics projects addressing real-world problems

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the interconnectedness of three or more mathematical concepts using graph theory.
Learners can design two personalized learning pathways via a recommendation system and establish execution plans.
Learners can apply mathematical concepts with over 80% accuracy in project-based assignments.
Learners can periodically assess their learning outcomes through formative assessments and achieve at least 70% proficiency.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
